website_summaries.verdict: An attractive walnut model that blends in with home decor. Best for 15-inch laptops and smaller.
pros: Bed desk holds a smaller laptop and mouse
Useful for laptops, drawing, writing, breakfast in bed, and more
cons: Thicker laptops may not stay in place
Not as comfortable for larger laps

customer_reviews.title: Great bang for your buck!
customer_reviews.text: Feels sturdy, useful cut-outs and small drawer for pens, stylus, highlighters, binder clips, paperclips, etc.., nice rich color. Great height for lap desk (should accommodate average sized person or those with extra pounds) or for placing on a desk to stand and work (burn more calories and save on cost of sit/stand desk!). Divider to create 3 adjustable tilted heights is a definite plus. Fold legs and go, so quite portable from table, to couch, to bed. No assembly, out of the box and ready to use. Exactly what I needed when working from home (COVID-19 YIKES!)
customer_reviews.author: Tari H.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good, but quality control is poor.
customer_reviews.text: It's pretty good. The only issue I've had so far, is when I got the product, 2 screws fell out of the holes where it holds the mouse portion of it to the wood. They were simply not wide enough and weren't holding anything together. I ended up having to put 2 wider screws in place of those. That probably shouldn't be a thing.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Boss

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase! Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: I found a few other products around the same price, some standing and some the same, but I think this was a good purchase. It’s a great product. Exactly as it was advertised. The legs don’t lock in place, but it should be fine if you don’t move much/bump them. The desk uses a latch/notch and bar to prop the desk up if you need to adjust the angle of your desk. Wish it used something more sturdy, but it works.
customer_reviews.author: Kyandre Lowery

customer_reviews.title: Amazing and so much cuter than some of the other options on amazon!
customer_reviews.text: This lap desk is so sleek and really makes working/ studying in bed way better. It's a nice option to have in quarantine while many are working from home. Took a few weeks to arrive but I would assume it is normally quicker when the world is running more normally. Also FYI it perfectly fits my laptop on the tiltable ledge and iPad on the mousepad side when taking notes during online lectures. Love the little phone slot too! Overall perfect for me and it was exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Nalty

customer_reviews.title: convenient--but arrived already chipped
customer_reviews.text: I really like the design of this desk, and as I'm working from my sofa during the COVID pandemic, I know it's going to be very helpful to me. I like having a slot to view my phone while working on the computer. The little drawer will serve as a handy drink holder. My only quibble is that it arrived with three different chipped spots. I can probably cover them up with black magic marker, but it's kind of the point of buying something new that there aren't chips already.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Olson

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and nice.  Using it now as I type this.
customer_reviews.text: It's very sturdy and a little bit heavy. I *love* the drawer on the side, the stop on the bottom, and the phone holder. The tilt is a nice feature too. I would like a finer resolution of options for the tilt - this could be made by cutting little slots in the underneath bracket. It could also be a little taller. I can't cross/fold my legs - have to use it while legs are out straight.
customer_reviews.author: Valarie V. Boatman

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately I had to wait 6 weeks for the delivery of this item. Inconvenient but understandable given the current state of the world. The most disappointing part is that the desk I received is missing the two slots at the top: the slot to hold a table and the slot to hold a cell phone. Very disappointing. Hoping to have this corrected sooner than another 6 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Melinda Fort

customer_reviews.title: wish there was a lock to hold legs in position
customer_reviews.text: the legs bend inwards and if you move it around without lifting or kick it by mistake.. the laptop goes for a sloppy slide ride :) got habituated not to push it anymore, but having a lock would keep the devices safe. Update: after 3 months use, the reaper near the left leg lost its position and is about to break. Have contacted seller for replacement of refund. Will update how it goes.
customer_reviews.author: Friendindeed

customer_reviews.title: Perfect little laptop desk
customer_reviews.text: I thought my 15 inch macbook would be too large for this, but it's perfect. I returned a similar desk that was wider but it was also deeper and not very portable because of its size. I put some rubber bumpers behind the legs so it will fit on my lounge chair cushion and not be too wide and now I can lounge around all summer and write. The quality of wood is nice and light and the color is a dark espresso color with a small black mousepad. I wish the drawer was deeper to store my mouse in and close but I can't have everything.
customer_reviews.author: Carlottia

customer_reviews.title: Awful design save your money
customer_reviews.text: Don't like it. I'm a leftie and this is so uncomfortable you have to shift either your body or the whole tray to have the laptop centered and comfortable for the wrists. There aren't any kind of locking mechanisms so I'll be doing work and the stands legs will suddenly buckle under toppling everything (INCLUDING MY $600 Laptop) over. It's also too low to place your legs comfortably under it. I'm 5'5 149lbs and if I'm not comfortable you probably won't be either.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as Pictured - Very functional
customer_reviews.text: Positives: I really like working with this lap desk. I can angle the "computer" side up for better working position. The built-in mouse pad is really nice and helps to quiet mouse movement. The slots in the top for the tablet and cell phone are a nice bonus. And It's handy to keep a notepad and pen in the little magnetized drawer. Room for Improvement: The only thing I would change (minor) would be to have the laptop surface slotted or ventilated in some way to help get air to the bottom of my laptop while working.
customer_reviews.author: clillies92

customer_reviews.title: Great for daily use but...
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a little desk I could use while sitting in bed. This one works great for that- I got it about a few weeks ago and have been using mine daily. I will say, the biggest flaw is that the legs that pull out do not stay in place in their own- they sort of curl in if you move around too much. The only way to remedy this would be to replace it with new screws (due to the type of screws it cane with you can’t simply just tighten them up). Aside from that I love it.
customer_reviews.author: HawkinCrazy

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: This tray is possibly the best thing I've spent money on in a long time. With working from home looking like a reality for a while longer, I needed something to help me get more comfortable until I can purchase a full sized desk. Not only is it cost effective, and was shipped quickly...It is spacious, and the slots fill all devices as described. Overall, it is extremely comfortable and easy to use. The ONLY thing preventing me from giving this product a full five stars is that there isn't any mechanism to lock the legs in place (that I can see - but correct me if I am wrong). Overall, a great buy, and I would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Tara Dames

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing product! I was worried it was gonna be too small, but it allows my 17.5inch laptop room! Granted it doesn't fit it perfectly, but I can still use the built-in mouse. The holes for tablet and phone are very convenient. Also, it looks really nice. My only recommendation is that there are locks for the legs so that when I slide it around the legs don't close so easily. But other than that, a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Axadorea

customer_reviews.title: Not happy with the seller
customer_reviews.text: The product was just ok - though the quality is decent , It was not comfortable near the hand rest. I was trying to return through ups drop off (no package - no label required) option but that option was not available for this seller / product unlike how I usually get for other products / sellers. So I couldn’t return the product on time as I didn’t have printer access to print the label. While communicating with the seller , they didn’t help me with the return , didn’t enable that option and also finally told me that the return window is 30 days and that the product is no longer eligible for return. Very disappointed !!
customer_reviews.author: Preethi

customer_reviews.title: Solid lap desk for work from home
customer_reviews.text: I bought this desk so I could use my laptop when I work from home outside on my patio. It’s very sturdy convenient and the tilt goes up and down depending on if I’m just typing or if I’m on a zoom call. It’s heavy and not light weight, which is only an issue when you’re carrying it as it has legs to stand on the chair or sofa. Could be nice for breakfast in bed if you had somebody willing to do that. Would really recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kay w.

customer_reviews.title: Very convenient! Great quality and has a lot of useful aspects!
customer_reviews.text: Love this bed desk! I am able to sit in bed and work on school work or watch Netflix comfortably. The quality is very good and there’s multiple different levels you can elevate your desk angle. I usually have my laptop on the seat and my note pad in the area the mouse pad is on while working on school work, and my phone in the space made to hold it which has an opening on the bottom to charge it while it’s still sitting up there nicely. When I’m done using it I place my pencils, pens, notepad, etc. in the drawer installed in the table and slide it under the bed! I am very happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Twinkel

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase!
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly as described! I like it because now that I’m at home I can use it as a mini desk... when I wanna sit for zoom meetings, I can put this on my coffee table and it’s the perfect height for me to sit on the couch. Or if I want to stand I put it on my counter/bar area with my laptop on it, and it’s the perfect height to stand during a zoom meeting. It came completely assembled, brand new. Love it. Very happy I purchased it.
customer_reviews.author: Brandy M. Heiges

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price and convenient
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for online classes and sitting in bed/floor. Reasons I bought this: Price, size, split desk for tilting laptop. QC wasn't all there as I found a loose screw, but I just put it back in and no issues since. It comes with a magnetic pencil/small notepad pullout which is convenient and it split tilts so your mouse doesn't slide off. Overall this was a great buy for me in terms of price and usablilty.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Vang

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and great quality. I use it when I’m lying in bed and want to either draw digital art on my iPad, or watch Netflix. Great how it lifts up at an angle. I would definitely recommend this table. Only small issue is it is kind of heavy, but that’s because it’s so sturdy so I’m getting use to moving it around when putting it up after use. Customer service is great and responsive as well.
customer_reviews.author: Christy

customer_reviews.title: I never have to leave my bed again
customer_reviews.text: Some people hate being quarantined. I thoroughly enjoy it. This bed-desk allows me remain horizontal for the rest of my life (or the rest of quarantine) while working from home. Not only can I use my laptop on it, I can put my plate on it when I'm ready for lunch or dinner. Now if they could just help me figure out how to keep all my food within arm's reach of my bed...
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Summerville

customer_reviews.title: Compact and practical
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my daughter to lounge on the couch AND get distant learning work in with COVID19. It came assembled and setting it up took less than a minute to prop up the stands. She uses this on the couch. You can use this as a breakfast in bed tray. My daughter also used to paint. It folds flat and sit on your ottoman as a solid surface or can be hidden under the couch.
customer_reviews.author: A Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: I second guessed myself about buying this. It sat in my cart for awhile and then my husband hit order all before verifying if I decided to buy it. Its awesome! The legs are sturdy and sit tightly in place. I dont use the part that comes up very much but the few times I have it has been sturdy. My MacBook fits nicely on it but if you have a larger laptop you may have space issues. The mouse pad works fine. The drawer is small but it says that in the description so I dont understand why people are faulting it on that. I can fit my phone (galaxy s10) and a few pens in it.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Reed

customer_reviews.title: Great of you don't use the tilt feature, laptop catch does not do its job.
customer_reviews.text: The lip on it that keeps the laptop from slipping of when you tilt it up for easier use does not do its job. I can't tilt it up on the lowest notch without my laptop sliding right off. Other than that it is very sturdy, love the drawer that is held shut magnetically. All in all, great piece of equipment, i just wish I could use it.
customer_reviews.author: Jessika

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: I have never had something like this before and I love it! My Fiance and I rent a small room so this table comes in handy to eat on and also switch over to work with my laptop and the adjustable height. During these special times of staying home and working from home... It's a well needed tool!
customer_reviews.author: TSK

customer_reviews.title: Simple & Easy lap desk to use
customer_reviews.text: The product carries out what is listed. The only reason NOT 5 stars is sturdiness could be better and wish there was more space to charge my devices through the ports. I only use this for work /study and it does the job. Pro: - Simple design - easy to open & put away Cons: - Space can get tight if your laptop is bigger than 15inch - Space for charging ports
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Fits my 17.3 inch Gaming Laptop!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this!!! I bought it for my new 17" gaming laptop and it fits that monster just fine! It's classy and does the job. Love the mouse pad. The little drawer will fit only pens/stylus and small things. Easy to unfold and prop up right out of the box in seconds. Feels solid and with every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Jenny New

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and serves its purpose well
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Very sturdy and well made for the price. My only complaints are that I wish it were wider because i like to sit crossed leg on the couch. But issur is easily resolved when i fold the legs in and just sit the unit on top of my lap. I also would have liked an option to have the mouse pad on the left side...but thats just me.
customer_reviews.author: HB

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy portable laptop table.
customer_reviews.text: I find that using this for my laptop has improved my posture. Also if I want to stand and use my laptop that's also very comfortable. I do wish that the trim/edge in front of the built-in mouse pad was rounded instead of just a straight edge. It makes it uncomfortable at times. I must say it's very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: CaroleR

customer_reviews.title: Good Work Surface
customer_reviews.text: I use this frequently when working from my laptop in a relative's hospital room. It's lightweight enough to transport back and forth, but certainly not flimsy. It is fairly sturdy and fits over my legs quite comfortably. When I take it off my lap, with the laptop still on it, and sit it next to me, I do have to be careful that one of the legs doesn't begin to close/collapse in doing so. My only wish is that there were a way to lock the legs in place for this reason. Overall, this is a great desk and it makes it much more comfortable for me to work away from my actual desk!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca M.

customer_reviews.title: professional sophisticated look
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed with the initial quality of the tray. But upon further inspection just a few imperfections along the edges but nothing too bad which is why I didn’t give the full 5 stars. Loved the color, to me it’s like a dark cherry oak. Like other reviews the legs don’t lock which if they did would make this an even better product and easier to move around. I’m using it with my iPad and iPhone and so far hold very well in the slots at the top. In doing a lot of research this seemed the best bang for my money. Overall pretty satisfied with it.
customer_reviews.author: JA

customer_reviews.title: Working from home? This is something you want.
customer_reviews.text: With the COVID-19 crisis I am so happy I found this! Working from home was a pain without an actual desk (or table, don’t judge live in a small apartment my coffee table is my table lol). With these times being uncertain I definitely didn’t want to go purchase a desk in fear that I could be furloughed from my employer any day now. I’ve been using it for about a week and my productivity has increased just by having this. Mostly the price point is definitely worth it and I promise you will not regret having.
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlyn

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Item
customer_reviews.text: The items came in almost perfect condition. There are a few small scratches but honestly, nothing all that serious. Hardly visible. The only issue i have is with the bar that is on top to stop your items from sliding. Its placement is centered on only that part of the table so it's in the way of where your arms rest.
customer_reviews.author: Candice

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: I got this to work from home during the covid-19 quarantine and it is great. Very sturdy and I like that the desk can be elevated at several angles. The only shortcoming is that the mobile phone holder at the top right corner doesn’t do a great job holding my iphone upright. Otherwise, awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Rosie

customer_reviews.title: Its 50 bucks but its built cheaply
customer_reviews.text: I dislike that the left side legs broke and I had to fix it. I mean 50 bucks like seriously wtf. It's not worth trying to return it. So watch out. If you are going to buy it just buy a some screws to screw it in. Update. Its garbage dont waste your money. It's best use is firewood.
customer_reviews.author: jacob

customer_reviews.title: Not the best for my needs
customer_reviews.text: if you have an ipad or any apple product it should work great. Sadly i don't and it does not fit in the grove and it does not work well with my windows tablet/laptop and it might fall at any minute of of it as i type this. its not comfortable for ifyou sit criss cross. its like a really really tiny tv tray taht dose not fit your legs well. i personaly hate it for what im using but maybe it will work for others.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it. Reccomend
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this lap desk. I got it for my son to use for distance learning. My husband uses it too for gaming. Easy to use right out of the box. I would buy it again if needed. I thought it was a little pricey to begin with but it well worth every penny
customer_reviews.author: amber

customer_reviews.title: Sweet
customer_reviews.text: Excellent for the students in your life who may not have time to sit at the dinner table. Great for someone who don’t feel good and needs to work from home with a laptop. I love the little slide out drawer for extra space. Naturally it is made from pressboard but it is quite sturdy
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Good for your computer
customer_reviews.text: At first I thought it was going to be too high, then I put the tilt up for my computer and it is perfect. It really is so much better for your computer to be on a flat surface like this rather than on your lap. It was getting hot my lap but now the computer is cooling down making the computer run faster!
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: It’s great!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed working from home with an infant. It looks great and it’s very sturdy. Love the side drawer.
customer_reviews.author: Tere

customer_reviews.title: Good For Purpose Intended
customer_reviews.text: Overall, fits the need mostly. Only thing is that the top has a lip meant to keep a laptop from sliding off towards you when the top is lifted/angled up ..but my chunky older laptop has a thick bottom so the lip is not high enough to keep it from.sliding off. Not a deal breaker though. Note, it is HEAVY so when I want to move it withbmy laptop on it it is a def two hand deal. I like the drawer and the included mouse pad.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Really great purchase
customer_reviews.text: I really love how this product is lightweight and doesnt require a big assembly! The oak finish is very smooth and is easy to clean. It's a tad unsteady (the little drawer is wobbly) and the legs sometimes wobble but it's not enough to consider it defective by any means. I use this to work from home and it supports my 13inch mac book just fine without it slipping. You're able to tilt the desk at a steeper angle if needed so I enjoy its versatility.
customer_reviews.author: Deja George

customer_reviews.title: Essential!
customer_reviews.text: Now that we’re all working from home, this has been absolutely essential to my set up. Sometimes I start to get restless sitting at my desk all day long and need a change of scenery. This has been great for working from my bed, on the couch, or even sitting on the floor. Love the slots for my phone and ipad. Love that it tilts, helps ease the tension on my wrists. And the little drawer on the side? Perfect for a phone charger or earpods.
customer_reviews.author: hannah wagner

customer_reviews.title: Great Table Tray
customer_reviews.text: This is such a great portable tray. Got this for my mom to use while she's on her tablet and it's PERFECT. It's sturdy, compact and portable and the finish is really pretty.
customer_reviews.author: scarlett66

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Bed Desk, but a bit heavy
customer_reviews.text: The desk works wonderful. I use it every day for work. It's adjustable and has a mouse pad plus a storage drawer. My only concern is that there aren't vents at the bottom and that it is a bit heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy T

customer_reviews.title: It’s perfect
customer_reviews.text: I just received my laptop desk. It’s perfect. I immediately disinfected it because you know - CoronaVirus - and I was thinking it’s a chance I have to take - even if it means it will ruin the finish and to my great surprise the finish didn’t come off or get ruined or anything. I love it. Definitely recommend. Only thing is the cell phone holder isn’t as deep as I would have liked but it’s still great all the same.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, doesn’t work great
customer_reviews.text: Here’s the thing. This desk is super high quality and comes with a lot of useful features. However, the intent is to be able to use it from spaces like couches, beds, etc. anything with a plush surface really. The legs won’t stay put and if you have items atop the desk it’s very difficult to get the legs to stay, and if they collapse, it’s hard to get them to be put back up. It’s very very heavy and flimsy, and overall just not something worth the price. Would be better if the legs could lock into place.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Exactly perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This lap desk is absolutely perfect. I was worried that it would be too small for my laptop but it is just right. It is sturdier than I thought and the mouse pad is great. I am really happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa K. Cortes

customer_reviews.title: Awesome buy
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Makes doing homework so much easier. The side storage is great and the levels of height work amazingly well. The color is a dark brown, but looks almost black. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: J. Perez

customer_reviews.title: Great Design
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the lap desk for my 12 yo to be comfortable and maintain a proper posture while learning from home. She is happy, she does not need to hold her tablet during zoom meetings, the tablet fits in the edge. I like the construction, finish, compact styling of the lap desk and her posture while learning. The item was delivered with an issue and Sofia+Sam customer service was awesome resolving the issue! I would purchase again from this company.
customer_reviews.author: Eyetoyou

customer_reviews.title: Solid and sturdy, good-looking and well made desk.
customer_reviews.text: No assembly was required. Product was shipped fast (arrived 4 days ahead of Amazon's estimated delivery date). Very impressed with the look - looks very high quality. I like the built-in mousepad and holders for your phone and tablet. This is going to make working from home a much more pleasant experience. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: J-Dub in Vegas

customer_reviews.title: Greatest purchase so far!!
customer_reviews.text: This has been AMAZING while having to work from home!!! It adjusts depending on where I'm working in the house. It's perfect for sitting in bed. It has a built in mouse pad and small drawer that's perfect for keeping track of my pens and highlighters. I would suggest this to anyone that uses a laptop! There's also a small slot that holds my phone which is perfect for video chats while still working!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality
customer_reviews.text: Came with a screw already fallen. Legs fall to easy. Support bar does not work
customer_reviews.author: fernando tsuruta

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my gamer friend. It works great very sturdy, very neat. He loved absolutely everything about it. Great for anyone that spends lots of time on the computer.
customer_reviews.author: CHARDEA

customer_reviews.title: Awesome desk, highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: This laptop desk was very well designed! I love that I can securely use my laptop, phone, and/or tablet without them sliding off. The legs are easy to extend, the whole product is durable, and built-in mousepad is the perfect finishing touch. I’m so happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Brandi Miller

customer_reviews.title: Best table tray I have bought
customer_reviews.text: This was a great table tray for the price. The table finish looks well done and it has the perfect space for a laptop to fit in. I love the iPad and cellphone compartments and that the laptop side can be angle adjustable. The table tray is a little heavy but overall looks like a fancy table tray.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriela montiel

customer_reviews.title: Damaged and unsturdy
customer_reviews.text: This lap desk was ok, it arrived damaged but even when we set it up the bolts were loose and it was not very sturdy. We had to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny M.

customer_reviews.title: highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: I purchased one for my daughter in college, and one for my sister who is a teacher. They both love this lap desk and have said it is light weight, sturdy and adjustable. I'm going to purchase one for myself next.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Madison

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love, it has a mouse pad a spot for my phone. Plus my large laptop fits great and the table top it adjust height. The drawer holds my pens and pad.
customer_reviews.author: shelly

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!
customer_reviews.text: Everything about this tray is awesome!! It's exactly what I needed since I will be working from home for the next couple of months. I've always wanted to work in bed and now with this tray and a purchase of a great pillow, it's going to make having to work from home that much more comfortable. I also love the design and the little drawer is perfect for keeping pens and pencils! Love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Joy Smith

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy small desk
customer_reviews.text: Love love love my new lazy desk. I call it lazy because now I don’t get out of my bed. The desk is sturdy and very useful for my basic needs such as laptop, mouse, phone and that’s about it. It has a small drawer compartment that I have not used but I can only imagine it will be used for pens, small paper notepads and easy to store small stuff. This desk came in handy during my teleworking days and no longer have to use a pillow in my bed.
customer_reviews.author: Dana

customer_reviews.title: Makes using laptop better.
customer_reviews.text: This is such a pretty table. I like how it's set up and that it brings the laptop closer to my level of sight. I have bad vision and it just makes easier for me to use it. It can also serve as a tray for breakfast in bed. But also you can use it while on our couch/chair. A tiny heavy but folds nicely and you can store it in a small narrow spaces.
customer_reviews.author: E_Torres

customer_reviews.text: It's ok wish it were sturdier and that it didn't collect dust so easy. Also wish it were a little higher or better to adjust.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa Galarza

customer_reviews.title: Great Table!!!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product. Allows for maximal productivity while lounging in bed. Seems to be really good quality, and it stores easily next to my bed. I like the little drawer and the different angles one can put it at. A good buy!
customer_reviews.author: Brianna Z.

customer_reviews.title: Wife loves it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife to use with her laptop and she loves it. She uses it in bed and on the couch. She also uses it as a dinner tray in the bed. She works on it for hours in the bed and says it's very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Micheal S Infinger

customer_reviews.title: The tilting tray is good for ergonomics. Very comfortable to use in a recliner.
customer_reviews.text: This is a good improvement for working at home, especially for ergonomics. If I could make minor changes, I would make the phone slot wide enough for horizontal placement and maybe a cup holder.
